WorkItem.Description:
I just picked up the downloadable wpf version of rawr, and loading the rawr.protpaladin module seems to cause an instant crash.  This happens if I try to load in a prot paladin character or if I start fresh and change the class to Paladin>Protpaladin.  It sadly does not give any error information beyond "Rawr.wpf has crashed".  When I set the class to a number of other specs and classes, this doesn't seem to happen, so it appears to be specific to rawr.protpaladin.
 
Steps to reproduce:
Simply try to load a protpaladin character or create a new protpaladin character in the wpf version of rawr.
 
Rawr 4.0.16b wpf
Windows 7 Ultimate 32-bit

Comments.Message: There is also a disconnect between the status of ProtPaladin in http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Models and on startup page vs the warning that it isn't at all Cataclysm ready on status line on selecting ProtPaladin as model.
